title: Tracing and CPU Profiling Outputs Error for Validator Client
body:
Currently when the validator client is shutdown it outputs this message when the CPU profiling and tracing flags are not enabled. : 
```golang
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO node: Got interrupt, shutting down...
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO proposer: Stopping service
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO attester: Stopping service
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO beacon: Stopping service
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO rpc-client: Stopping service
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO txpool: Stopping shard txpool service
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO p2p: Stopping service
[2018-09-21 16:19:32]  INFO node: Stopping sharding validator
[2018-09-21 16:19:32] ERROR Failed to stop CPU profiling: CPU profiling not in progress
[2018-09-21 16:19:32] ERROR Failed to stop go tracing: trace not in progress
```
When the flags are enabled however another error occurs : 
When CPU Profile dump is being written:
```golang
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest crystallized beacon state from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = grpc: the client connection is closing
```
When tracing dump is being written:
```golang
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest attestation from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = context canceled
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest attestation from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = context canceled
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest attestation from stream: rpc error: code = Canceled desc = context canceled
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest beacon block from stream: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest beacon block from stream: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest beacon block from stream: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest beacon block from stream: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
[2018-09-21 18:16:13] ERROR beacon: Could not receive latest beacon block from stream: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
```
A PR will resolve both these issues which occurs when the flags are enabled and disabled
